author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Advanced Drainage Systems Posts Q3 EPS ‍$0.51​
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Advanced Drainage Systems Inc:
* ADVANCED DRAINAGE SYSTEMS ANNOUNCES THIRD QUARTER FISCAL 2018 RESULTS
* Q3 SALES ROSE 8.9 PERCENT TO $320.8 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 SALES $1.275 BILLION TO $1.325 BILLION * QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.51 * QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER FULLY CONVERTED SHARE WAS $0.47
* QTRLY EPS ‍$0.51​ * CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ARE EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $50 MILLION TO $55 MILLION FOR 2018
* 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $195 AND $210 MILLION
* ‍HAS CONFIRMED ITS NET SALES AND ADJUSTED EBITDA TARGETS FOR FISCAL 2018​
* SEES FISCAL YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA TO BE IN RANGE OF $195 AND $210 MILLION
* Q3 REVENUE VIEW $311.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $1.32 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
